statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_segmentation ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT customer_id, age, income FROM customer_segmentation WHERE income < 50000
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_id, age, income, gender FROM customer_segmentation ORDER BY income ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_segmentation WHERE income > 50000
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, income, purchase_history->'total_purchases' AS total_purchases FROM customer_segmentation WHERE income BETWEEN 30000 AND 70000
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE purchase_history @> '{"last_purchase_date": "2021-10-15"}' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 20;
SELECT location, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY location
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%New York%'

SELECT customer_id, age, location, purchase_date FROM customer_demographics INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_demographics.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC

SELECT customer_id, gender, location, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_demographics LEFT JOIN purchase_history ON customer_demographics.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE gender = 'Female' OR purchase_amount < 50 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC, location
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, page_views FROM behavior WHERE page_views > 1000 ORDER BY page_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior WHERE page_views > 100 AND time_spent_on_site > '1 hour';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE online_activity = TRUE;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, online_activity, purchase_preferences FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE online_activity = TRUE;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics JOIN CustomerBehavior ON CustomerDemographics.customer_id = CustomerBehavior.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT result_id, campaign_id, customer_id, conversion_rate FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE engagement_score > 80
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
